optimized_sql: WITH filtered_item AS ( SELECT i_item_sk, i_manufact_id, i_category FROM item WHERE (i_manufact_id BETWEEN 566 AND 765 OR i_category IN ('Children', 'Jewelry', 'Men')) ), filtered_dates AS ( SELECT d_date_sk, d_date FROM date_dim WHERE d_date BETWEEN DATE '2002-03-06' AND (DATE '2002-03-06' + INTERVAL '90 day') ), fact_prefilter AS ( SELECT ws.ws_item_sk, ws.ws_sold_date_sk, ws.ws_ext_discount_amt, ws.ws_wholesale_cost, ws.ws_sales_price, ws.ws_list_price FROM web_sales ws INNER JOIN filtered_dates fd ON fd.d_date_sk = ws.ws_sold_date_sk WHERE ws.ws_wholesale_cost BETWEEN 16 AND 36 ), item_avg AS ( SELECT fp.ws_item_sk, 1.3 * AVG(fp.ws_ext_discount_amt) AS threshold FROM fact_prefilter fp WHERE fp.ws_sales_price / fp.ws_list_price BETWEEN 35 * 0.01 AND 50 * 0.01 GROUP BY fp.ws_item_sk ), final_join AS ( SELECT fp.ws_ext_discount_amt FROM filtered_item fi INNER JOIN fact_prefilter fp ON fi.i_item_sk = fp.ws_item_sk INNER JOIN item_avg ia ON fp.ws_item_sk = ia.ws_item_sk WHERE fp.ws_ext_discount_amt > ia.threshold ) SELECT SUM(fj.ws_ext_discount_amt) AS "Excess Discount Amount" FROM final_join fj ORDER BY SUM(fj.ws_ext_discount_amt) ASC LIMIT 100
